Schools.Name: Ahmadu Bello University
Schools.motto: The first duty of every university is the search for and the spread of knowledge and the establishment of the nation.

Schools.Name: Bayero University
Schools.motto: …. And above every possessor of knowledge, there is the one more learned.

Schools.Name: University of Nigeria, Nsukka
Schools.motto: To restore the dignity of man.
